name: Coghlan's Telescoping Fork
description: So far beyond cooking food on a stick. This is a nickel-plated fork that telescopes to reach the prime spot over the coals. An integrated thumb roller rotates the food to ensure an even cook. That is the level of refined campfire cooking we are dealing with here.Max extended length is 86cm.Wooden handle with a nickel plated shaft and an integrated thumb roller.Compacts to stow in our pack.
